content.theme: Toxicity is fuel. Inject it for power. Vent it through violence.
content.design: Leech augments reward high toxicity states that other contractors would flee from.

augments.name: Furnace Core
augments.effect: Unlocks Burn: inject toxicity → gain self-buffs

augments.name: Toxin Push
augments.effect: Unlocks Bleed: on melee hit, vent 1 toxicity as +1 damage

augments.name: Rift Appetite
augments.effect: Gain toxicity 1 faster from ambient sources (more fuel)

augments.name: Overdrive
augments.effect: New Burn: +3 toxicity → +1 movement, +1 accuracy for 2 rounds

augments.name: Siphon Strike
augments.effect: Bleed upgrade: each hit now vents 1 toxicity as +2 bonus damage

augments.name: Draining Touch
augments.effect: Alt Bleed: on melee hit, vent toxicity as healing instead of damage

augments.name: Contaminated Blood
augments.effect: When hit in melee, attacker gains +1 toxicity

augments.name: Toxic Aura
augments.effect: At 50%+ toxicity: adjacent enemies take 1 damage/round

augments.name: Corrosive Strikes
augments.effect: Bleed upgrade: vented toxicity also reduces target Armor by 1 for 1 round

augments.name: Meltdown Protocol
augments.effect: 3 rounds: auto-transfer 3 tox/hit, +1 self per round. After: exhausted 1 round

augments.name: Necrotic Field
augments.effect: Toxic Aura upgrade: adjacent enemies take 1d4 damage

augments.name: Walking Meltdown
augments.effect: At 80%+ toxicity: all Burn effects doubled. All Bleed damage +3. If you hit 100%, instead of harvest: explode for 4d10 to all within 3 squares, then drop to 50%
